result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew M Wright Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court ordered all mandatory costs, fees and surcharges waived due to low income.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew M Wright Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Andrew M Wright in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Andrew M Wright in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.

The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 3 DAYS  in the House of Correction,  with credit for 3 days time served. 

Court ordered all mandatory costs, fees and surcharges waived due to low income.

NOTE:  Court directs the Clerk of Courts Office to notify the Department of Motor Vehicles that  ZERO DAYS (0 days) REVOCATION should be imposed in this case. 

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Attorney Terese M. Dick in court via phone, defendant Andrew M Wright not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty out ill.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch
 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 03-12-2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Terese M. Dick in court, defendant Andrew M Wright not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 03-10-2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Andrew M Wright in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  
Defendant Andrew M Wright in custody.  
Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Andrew M Wright Jr
Current: 2541A N 24th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 01-25-2015)
Prior: 2961 North Palmer Street, Milwaukee, WI 53212
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
